description: core object found in all modules

schema_url.description: URL of json schema document that validates this version of this module.

schema_version.description: Version number in major.minor.patch format. Example 3.2.4.  Major version changes likely require change to software.  Patches are just documentation changes

type.description: A name for the type of object/module. By convention also the file name (without dir or extension) of json schema or entity level metadata file

title: core
